```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
dir <- file.path(getwd(),"data")

# summary stats of users' age groups, country destination, gender...
age_gender <- read.csv(file.path(dir, "age_gender_bkts.csv"))
str(age_gender)
unique(age_gender$country_destination)

# summary stats of destination countries
countries <- read.csv(file.path(dir, "countries.csv"))
str(countries)

# 213,451 userss
train_users <- read.csv(file.path(dir, "train_users_2.csv"))
str(train_users)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(train_users, aes(x = gender, colour = country_destination, fill = country_destination)) + 
  geom_bar()
```
